web_snippets: Evan Sabba is a Canadian voice actor known for providing the voice of Brad Vickers for Resident Evil 3: Nemesis.[1] IMDb profile Evan Sabba on Twitter ...
Evan Sabba was born on 27 May 1970 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. He is an actor, known for Resident Evil 3: Nemesis (1999), Alphas (2011) and Covert Affairs ...
